Uses of Class
io.permazen.core.Transaction

Packages that use Transaction
Package
Description
io.permazen
Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
io.permazen.cli
Components that support integrating Permazen into a Java Console Toolkit console.
io.permazen.cli.cmd
Permazen CLI Command related classes, including pre-defined commands.
io.permazen.cli.parse
Permazen parsing related classes.
io.permazen.core
Core classes for the Permazen Java persistence layer.
io.permazen.core.util
Permazen core API utility classes.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DetachedTransaction
    A Transaction that is not actually connected to a persistent database, but instead exists just to hold objects in memory.
